name: Robot C++ Development
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget python3 && cd /tmp && wget -q https://boostorg.jfrog.io/artifactory/main/release/1.85.0/source/boost_1_85_0.tar.gz && tar xzf boost_1_85_0.tar.gz && cd boost_1_85_0 && ./bootstrap.sh --prefix=/usr/local --with-libraries=system,thread,filesystem,regex,test,chrono,atomic,date_time,program_options,json && sudo ./b2 -j$(nproc) install && sudo ldconfig && cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 --branch v3.4.0 https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2.git && cd Catch2 && cmake -B build -S . -DBUILD_TESTING=OFF && sudo cmake --build build --target install && if [ -n "$SSH_AUTH_SOCK" ]; then mkdir -p ~/.ssh && ssh-add -L 2>/dev/null | head -1 > ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub && git config --global user.signingkey ~/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub; fi && cd /tmp && rm -rf boost_1_85_0*'
